item.title: How This Blog Works
item.description: Requirements Math. Preferably Latex. Citations. I like to cite stuff. Figures and pictures and references to thereof. Be able to export to Github Flavored Markdown. The Stack All documents are in Markdown. Specifically Pandoc Markdown. Obviously, the source is processed via pandoc. The site itself is compiled using Hugo. The current version (as of this writing) doesn’t support any configuration when using Pandoc for markup processing. By default Hugo only passes the --mathjax option to the pandoc invocation.
